The authors of the study clarified that: 19 and cautioned against generalizing the study's findings.
The study was conducted in Wuhan: China, in the latter half of May 2020 after a strict lockdown had been lifted.
The expert: Fujian Song, one of the authors of the study, emphasized that the identified asymptomatic cases were truly asymptomatic, but individuals in other settings may be temporarily asymptomatic or pre-symptomatic and can still spread the virus.
